mapper.sql: id, order_no, cust_id, resolver_id, resolve_status, resolver_name, total_fee, pay_status, comment_status, longitude, latitude, create_time, update_time, `describe`, other
mapper.select:
select
from `order` where cust_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id DESC

mapper.select: SELECT `order`.id AS id, `order`.order_no AS order_no, `order`.other AS fault_code, `order`.`describe` AS fault_describe, `order`.create_time AS create_time, `order`.update_time AS finish_time, `order`.longitude AS longitude, `order`.latitude AS latitude, customer.cust_id AS cust_id, customer.cust_name AS cust_name, customer.cust_phone AS cust_phone, customer.car_brand AS car_brand, customer.car_id AS car_id FROM `order`, customer WHERE `order`.cust_id = customer.cust_id AND `order`.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `order`.id AS id, `order`.order_no AS order_no, `order`.other AS fault_code, `order`.`describe` AS fault_describe, `order`.create_time AS create_time, `order`.update_time AS finish_time, `order`.longitude AS longitude, `order`.latitude AS latitude, customer.cust_id AS cust_id, customer.cust_name AS cust_name, customer.cust_phone AS cust_phone, customer.car_brand AS car_brand, customer.car_id AS car_id FROM `order`, customer WHERE `order`.cust_id = customer.cust_id AND `order`.resolver_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND `order`.resolve_status = 'FINISH'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) todayCount FROM `order` WHERE resolver_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(now())) A , (SELECT COUNT(*) monthCount FROM `order` WHERE resolver_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )) B , (SELECT COUNT(*) totalCount FROM `order` WHERE resolver_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) C
